snippet.title: Gordian Quest Big Update: Act III, PvP Mode and More!
snippet.description:
Gordian Quest: https://store.steampowered.com/app/981430/Gordian_Quest/
The latest update brings in new story content for the campaign, the long-awaited introduction of PvP game mode, leaderboards, and additional gameplay improvements.

Leave the Azul Desert and continue your adventures in Act III: The Faded Peaks, an icy mountain region once home to the Vanai. Unlock new mysteries, face new threats and experiment with new strategies!
